why: Developed a web app based on pure javscript to fetch data from yelp api on hottest restaurants near me, and present the data on a web page on a google map. Courtesy to prof. Leonidas Fegaras
storyParas: Sem 2 Web Data Management project - Yelp Reviews
The app will get the data from yelp api on specific lat long co-ordinate
This list will be presented to the user as pins on a Google Map
The user can drag, zoom in/out, and explore the presented restaurants on the map. Events on the map will invoke new response from yelp. Interacting with the pin will get details on that restaurant
Had the most fun in styling the page, tried my hand on the comic theme which I so dearly loved
